The Hellenic Association for Promotion of Conservation Agriculture (HACA) is a non profit national organization for the promotion of sustainable agriculture practices in Greece. HACA is the official representative for Greece on the European Conservation Agriculture Federation (ECAF)

The main goals of HACA are:

1. The promotion of sustainable agriculture practices and more specific of Conservation Agriculture in Greece in order to facilitate the protection of natural resources, reduce inputs, enhance biodiversity and eliminate environmental pollution
2. The enhancement, promotion and coordination research activities related to the topics of sustainable and conservation agriculture
3. The enhancement, promotion and coordination of training actions related to the topics of sustainable and conservation agriculture
4. The elaboration, development and implementation of informative actions and trainings on farmers and other stakeholders concerning the topics of sustainable and conservation agriculture
5. The registration, scientific study and promotion of technologies and applications related to the sustainable and conservation agriculture practices.
6. The coordination of communication, collaboration and exchange information on national and international level among associations and individuals about the techniques to promote sustainable and conservation agriculture
7. The information of authorities on scientific and technical aspects related to sustainable and conservation agriculture
